entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
